item.title: DiMSUM: Diffusion Mamba - A Scalable and Unified Spatial-Frequency Method for Image Generation
item.description: DiMSUM: A novel diffusion model boosts image generation by unifying spatial and frequency information, achieving superior results and faster training.

item.title: Mixture of Experts Meets Prompt-Based Continual Learning
item.description: Non-linear Residual Gates (NoRGa) boosts prompt-based continual learning by theoretically framing prefix tuning as adding new experts to a pre-trained Mixture-of-Experts model, achieving state-of-the-…
